title: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | May 2023

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The agenda and minutes for any meeting of the Amtrak Board of Directors that occurred in the month of May 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Heckscher

title: Amtrak Board of Directors - Meeting Agendas and Minutes | Jan 2023 - 3rd request

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The minutes for any meeting of the Amtrak Board of Directors that occurred on January 25, 2023 and/or January 26, 2023.

Noting, (a) that in the normal course of business these minutes would have been approved at the meetings of the Board that were held on May 24, 2023 and, (b) that I previously requested these minutes on June 8, 2023 under FOIA Request #23-FOI-00212 and, (c) that the requested minutes were not included in the response that Amtrak provided to me on September 27, 2023 for FOIA Request  #23-FOI-00212.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Heckscher

title: Request to CIA for 1997 photo of Patrick Stewart at CIA Headquarters

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Request to CIA for 1997 photo of Patrick Stewart at CIA Headquarters
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy (preferably a high-quality color copy) of the photograph taken of Hollywood actor Patrick Stewart during his visit to CIA headquarters in Langley, Virginia, on December 19, 1997, as mentioned in a January 21, 1998, "What's News at CIA" bulletin (No. 488), which I've attached to this request for your reference. I have also attached "What News at CIA" bulletin No. 483, dated December 24, 1997, which describes Stewart's visit.

According to the document, which was approved for release in 2005, the photograph of Patrick Stewart is "available" at "OHB," but the exact location is redacted.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo
